title: Boris Johnson to be fined by police over lockdown-breaking parties at UK government premises - CNN
content:
1. Boris Johnson to be fined by police over lockdown-breaking parties at UK government premises  CNN
  2. Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak fined over lockdown-breaking parties  The Independent
  3. Covid Live Updates: Boosters, Mandates and China  The New York Times
  4. They broke the law and are disgraced. Whatever they do now, shame will cling to Johnson and Sunak  The Guardian
  5. The prime minister is a lawbreaker â€“ and he is staying put  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Prime Minister Boris Johnson and his finance minister Rishi Sunak have been told they will be fined by police over lockdown-breaking parties held on UK government premises, a Downing Street spokesperson told CNN on Tuesday.
